title: News 1
fullnews: MTN Night Plan (Pulse Nightlife Bundle) offers discounted data rates from 11:00 PM to 6:00 AM. To access, subscribers must be on the MTN Pulse tariff plan. As of April 2025, users can activate 500MB for N75. Migration to MTN Pulse is required for non-Pulse subscribers.
